evidence.text: The case was dismissed via stipulation (Document 65) without any court-ordered monitoring. The Order on Cross-Motions for Summary Judgment (Document 58) addresses constitutional claims but does not establish a monitoring mechanism or reference any monitor reports.

evidence.source_document: Order on Cross-Motions for Summary Judgment
evidence.text: The Order on Cross-Motions for Summary Judgment (Document 58) concludes with a declaratory judgment and directs parties to meet and confer about injunctive relief, but contains no mention of a court-appointed monitor. The subsequent Stipulation for Dismissal (Document 65) terminates the case without any reference to monitoring requirements.
